name: Bumper Baby Battle
description:
Get your bumper cars ready to do some battle with your other baby bros! Be the one to get the most hits with your baby beach balls and win the day! 

It uses the standard WASD keys and a mouse. Use the mouse to aim and fire at the other players. You can have 2-4 players networked together. It's a top-down arena shooter style of game. So are you ready to "connect" your beach balls with your friends faces? And do it again and again? Yeah I thought you did. Good Luck!

Music was written by the very talented Josh Sohn

This game was built with Unity and Photon Fusion.
